DOC.brief_summary: This control randomized , single-masked , crossover study 48 subject use Biofinity Contact Lens ( comfilcon A ) two lens care product ( 'solutions ' ) , ( Synergi Biotrue Multi-purpose Solution ) one month . Follow-up visit solution take place one week , two week four week : one-week 'wash-out ' period solution . Key outcome measure study include biomicroscopic subjective response lens/solution combination .
DOC.brief_title: The Clinical Performance Biofinity Contact Lens ( Comfilcon A ) With Two Lens Care Systems
